about_the_game:
The General

A new, fully voice acted, hero unit, The General, will be made available for deployment in the Defense in Depth and Sector Defense modes. The General will stay inside of his bunker, training any soldiers inside of it. Protect him at all costs! If The General is killed, then your men will break in a massive rout!

The General's Bunker

Enclosed with thick concrete walls, The General's Bunker will provide maximum protection to anyone hiding inside. Soldiers inside the bunker cannot shoot out, but they are also protected from incoming enemy bullets and explosions. This is where The General and his bodyguard will reside.

short_description: Lead the fight directly on the frontlines with The General, a hard-ass staff officer determined to end the war at any costs! The General is uncompromising, bringing out the best in your men, but his importance as the commander of your unit means the enemy will be doubly determined to eliminate him.
